alert.note: Alert for Brown; Eastern Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Cherry and southern Brown Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1130 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Johnstown, or 17 miles southwest of Ainsworth, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hofeld Lake, Raven, Jones Lake, Moon Lake, Willow Lake State Wildlife Management Area and Long Lake State Wildlife Management Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in North Platte.
